author: W1356LNalanc
title: Comfortable accommodation in Montmartre, Paris
text:
These were very comfortable facilities and the rooms were spotless. There was excellent and very friendly service from all of the staff, with well prepared food and lots of choice. The hotel was well located close to Metro and Bus services, and was close to the Basilica of Scare Coeur. There were also lovely views across the city of Paris from our windows. I was very happy and would go there again..
